sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_nb_action.RecommendedAction</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RecommendedAction</name>
        <script><![CDATA[
            
            var RecommendedAction = Class.create();
            RecommendedAction.prototype = {
                initialize: function () {},

                getActionInputs: function () {
                    return this.actionInputs;
                },

                setActionInputs: function (actionInputs) {
                    this.actionInputs = actionInputs;
                },

                getAction: function () {
                    return this.action;
                },

                setAction: function (action) {
                    this.action = action;
                },

                getHint: function () {
                    return this.hint;
                },

                setHint: function (hint) {
                    this.hint = hint;
                },
                getGroups: function () {
                    return this.groups;
                },
                getGroupsAsArray: function () {
                    if (gs.nil(this.groups) || this.groups.length <= 0) 
                        return;
                    
                    return this.groups.split(",");
                },
                setGroups: function (groups) {
                    this.groups = groups;
                },

                setActionInputLabels: function (actionInputLabels) {
                    this.actionInputLabels = actionInputLabels;
                },
                getIsGenius: function () {
                    return this.isGenius;
                },
                setIsGenius: function (geniusId) {
                    if (geniusId) 
                        return this.isGenius = true;
                    
                    return this.isGenius = false;
                },
                getActionInputLabels: function () {
                    return this.actionInputLabels;
                },
                type: 'RecommendedAction'
            };

            RecommendedAction.createFromRule = function (action, actionInputs, hint, /* comma separated string*/
            groups) {
                recommendedActionObj = new RecommendedAction();
                recommendedActionObj.setAction(action);
                recommendedActionObj.setActionInputs(actionInputs);
                recommendedActionObj.setHint(hint);
                recommendedActionObj.setGroups(groups);
                return recommendedActionObj;
            };

            RecommendedAction.createFromSearchRecord = function (action, actionInputs, hint, actionInputLabels, geniusId) {
                recommendedActionObj = new RecommendedAction();
                recommendedActionObj.setAction(action);
                recommendedActionObj.setActionInputs(actionInputs);
                recommendedActionObj.setHint(hint);
                recommendedActionObj.setActionInputLabels(actionInputLabels);
                recommendedActionObj.setIsGenius(geniusId);
                return recommendedActionObj;
            };]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-02-25 13:37:45</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ad32e2a1eb6220106fd0b6302a52283d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RecommendedAction</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Recommended Actions" source="sn_nb_action">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Recommended Actions">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ad32e2a1eb6220106fd0b6302a52283d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 13:24:11</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
